statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT compliance_status, compliance_details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, block_height FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE block_height > 10000;
SELECT compliance_status, transaction_hash FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE block_height < 5000;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, block_height, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_hash, compliance_details->'country', compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE block_height > 10000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE block_height BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY compliance_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT block_number, transaction_hash, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT legal_entity_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT compliance_id, legal_entity_name FROM regulatory_compliance JOIN blockchain_transactions ON regulatory_compliance.transaction_id = blockchain_transactions.transaction_id;

SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, compliance_status FROM blockchain_transactions JOIN regulatory_compliance ON blockchain_transactions.transaction_id = regulatory_compliance.transaction_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY sender_address ASC;
SELECT block_number, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_number ORDER BY latest_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_requirements;
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM compliance_requirements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_logs WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, regulation_name, regulation_description FROM compliance_requirements ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_requirements WHERE regulation_name = 'GDPR';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM compliance_requirements ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND receiver_address = '0x4B7c73552a1138D782079efA65c4e09e8285db47' ORDER BY transaction_time ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_time FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '%0x4B7c73552a1%' AND transaction_amount < 5000;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_logs WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, from_address, to_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body, description FROM regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'SEC';
SELECT record_id, compliance_status, compliance_date FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = '0x4b0897b0513fdc7c541b6d9d7e929c4e5364d2db';

SELECT tr.transaction_id, tr.timestamp, tr.from_address, tr.to_address, tr.amount, cr.compliance_status FROM blockchain_transactions tr JOIN compliance_records cr ON tr.transaction_id = cr.transaction_id WHERE cr.compliance_status = 'compliant';

SELECT u.username, u.email, b.block_number, b.amount, cr.compliance_status FROM users u JOIN blockchain_transactions b JOIN compliance_records cr ON b.transaction_id = cr.transaction_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT agency_name, agency_contact_person FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_address, account_balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_balance < 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT agency_name, agency_contact_person, agency_contact_email FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT account_address, account_balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT report_date, report_text FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
